title: Client crashed; now it is repairing, and I got placed to lower priority queue.
body: I just started a game and the game crashed telling me that the clients needs to be fixed and because of it I was placed in lower priority queue which I do not think it is right since it was not my choice to  exit the game but RIOT's new clients' bug hence I wanted to hear from rioters if the lower priority queue be removed.

replies.body:
While we can't do much about the LPQ, since that will only happen after multiple left matches, we _can_ however troubleshoot what really happened so that you don't get hit with an LPQ again. 

Since you mentioned the game crashed on you, were you able to get the launcher fixed up and get back on the Rift yet? If not, check out the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and let me know what other kinds of problems you're seeing.
